701694f-b.title: Bronx: Reservoir Oval East - Holt Place
701694f-b.text:
(1)  Reservoir Oval East, west from a point west of Holt Place. The thoroughfare curves northward, showing buildings extending to East 208th Street (extreme right). Also shown is the southern end of the former Williamsbridge Reservoir, now (1938) a playground.

November 8, 1934
F.L.Sperr

(2) A view northeastward across the former reservoir from the same vantage point as in view 1. Thew buildings extend north to a point below East 210th Street (extreme right).

November 8, 1934
F.L.Sperr
701694f-b.folder: Reservoir Oval East & Holt Place, Bronx, NY

701694f-a.title: Bronx: Reservoir Oval East - Holt Place
701694f-a.text:
(1)  Reservoir Oval East, west from a point west of Holt Place. The thoroughfare curves northward, showing buildings extending to East 208th Street (extreme right). Also shown is the southern end of the former Williamsbridge Reservoir, now (1938) a playground.

November 8, 1934
F.L.Sperr

(2) A view northeastward across the former reservoir from the same vantage point as in view 1. Thew buildings extend north to a point below East 210th Street (extreme right).

November 8, 1934
F.L.Sperr
701694f-a.folder: Reservoir Oval East & Holt Place, Bronx, NY

701695f-b.title: Bronx: Reservoir Oval East - Holt Place
701695f-b.text:
(2) A view northwestward across the former reservoir from the same vantage point as in view 1, showing buildings skirting the northern extremity of the reservoir, and extending from Reservoir Place to Tryon
Ave. (left).

November 5, 1934
F.L.Sperr
